item.name: DataSet1
item.query: SELECT ALLOWED RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.Company, RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.StructuralUnit, RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.Currency AS Currency, RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalance, RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalance, 0 AS AmountReceipt, 0 AS AmountExpense, RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurOpeningBalance, RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurClosingBalance, 0 AS AmountCurReceipt, 0 AS AmountCurExpense, RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.CostOpeningBalance, RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.CostClosingBalance, 0 AS CostReceipt, 0 AS CostExpense, RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.DayPeriod, RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.WeekPeriod, RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.TenDaysPeriod, RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.MonthPeriod, RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.QuarterPeriod, RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.HalfYearPeriod, RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.YearPeriod, CASE WHEN RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.Recorder = UNDEFINED THEN NULL ELSE RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.Recorder END AS Recorder FROM AccumulationRegister.RetailAmountAccounting.BalanceAndTurnovers(, , Auto, RegisterRecords, ) AS RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers

item.name: DataSet2
item.query:
SELECT ALLOWED CASE WHEN RetailAmountAccounting.Recorder = UNDEFINED THEN NULL ELSE RetailAmountAccounting.Recorder END AS Recorder, RetailAmountAccounting.Company, RetailAmountAccounting.StructuralUnit, RetailAmountAccounting.Currency AS Currency, RetailAmountAccounting.AmountCur AS AmountCurReceipt, RetailAmountAccounting.Amount AS AmountReceipt, RetailAmountAccounting.Cost AS CostReceipt, NULL AS AmountCurExpense, NULL AS AmountExpense, NULL AS CostExpense, 0 AS AmountCurOpeningBalance, 0 AS AmountOpeningBalance, 0 AS CostOpeningBalance, 0 AS AmountCurClosingBalance, 0 AS AmountClosingBalance, 0 AS CostClosingBalance, BEGINOFPERIOD(RetailAmountAccounting.Period, Day) AS DayPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(RetailAmountAccounting.Period, WEEK) AS WeekPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(RetailAmountAccounting.Period, TENDAYS) AS TenDaysPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(RetailAmountAccounting.Period, MONTH) AS MonthPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(RetailAmountAccounting.Period, QUARTER) AS QuarterPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(RetailAmountAccounting.Period, YEAR) AS YearPeriod FROM AccumulationRegister.RetailAmountAccounting AS RetailAmountAccounting WHERE RetailAmountAccounting.RecordType = VALUE(AccumulationRecordType.Receipt) AND CASE WHEN &EndOfPeriod = DATETIME(1, 1, 1) THEN RetailAmountAccounting.Period >= &BeginOfPeriod ELSE RetailAmountAccounting.Period between &BeginOfPeriod AND &EndOfPeriod END
UNION ALL
SELECT RetailAmountAccounting.Recorder, RetailAmountAccounting.Company, RetailAmountAccounting.StructuralUnit, RetailAmountAccounting.Currency, NULL, NULL, NULL, RetailAmountAccounting.AmountCur, RetailAmountAccounting.Amount, RetailAmountAccounting.Cost, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, BEGINOFPERIOD(RetailAmountAccounting.Period, Day), BEGINOFPERIOD(RetailAmountAccounting.Period, WEEK), BEGINOFPERIOD(RetailAmountAccounting.Period, TENDAYS), BEGINOFPERIOD(RetailAmountAccounting.Period, MONTH), BEGINOFPERIOD(RetailAmountAccounting.Period, QUARTER), BEGINOFPERIOD(RetailAmountAccounting.Period, YEAR) FROM AccumulationRegister.RetailAmountAccounting AS RetailAmountAccounting WHERE RetailAmountAccounting.RecordType = VALUE(AccumulationRecordType.Expense) AND CASE WHEN &EndOfPeriod = DATETIME(1, 1, 1) THEN RetailAmountAccounting.Period >= &BeginOfPeriod ELSE RetailAmountAccounting.Period between &BeginOfPeriod AND &EndOfPeriod END

v8:item.v8:content: Accrual accounting in retail outlet (man. cur.)
